Package Assignments.A2_Genetic_Algorithm.models

Class PopulationManager

java.lang.Object
Assignments.A2_Genetic_Algorithm.models.PopulationManager
public class PopulationManager extends Object
A class to manage the population of individuals and performs Genetic Algorithm operations and functions.
Version:
Spring 2024
Author:
Jonathan Turner

  • Method Details

    • evolution

      public static int evolution(BinaryVector[] population)
      Performs the Genetic Algorithm (GA) using a pre-provided population and a mutation percentage and size of population. It first finds the Elite individuals, crossover's their values, and mutates them. Lastly it adds the values back to the population and checks if the desired value is presents.
      Parameters:
      population - the population being operated on
      Returns:
      the number of generations.

    • check

      public static boolean check(BinaryVector[] population)
      Checks if there is an individual in the population that has a fitness of 0 (wanted).
      Parameters:
      population - the population being checked
      Returns:
      if there is an individual with fitness 0.

    • generate_population

      public static BinaryVector[] generate_population(int n_pop)
      Create a new population of n_pop individuals with random genes.
      Parameters:
      n_pop - the number of individuals in the population.
      Returns:
      a population is returned with n_pop individuals

    • selection

      public static BinaryVector[] selection(BinaryVector[] population)
      Returns the list of elite selected individuals from the population.
      Parameters:
      population - the current population.
      Returns:
      the elite selection population.

    • fitness

      public static int fitness(BinaryVector individual)
      Calculate the fitness of an BinaryVector based on the genes' value in binary form and powers it by 2.
      Parameters:
      individual - the BinaryVector to calculate the fitness
      Returns:
      the fitness of the individual

    • mutation

      public static BinaryVector mutation(BinaryVector individual, double p_m)
      Mutates the genes of a BinaryVector with a probability p_m.
      Parameters:
      individual - the BinaryVector to mutate
      p_m - the probability of mutation
      Returns:
      the mutated BinaryVector

    • crossover

      public static BinaryVector[] crossover(BinaryVector firstParent, BinaryVector secondParent)
      Breeds the two parent individuals to two new child vectors.
      Parameters:
      firstParent - the first parent individual
      secondParent - the second parent individual
      Returns:
      an array of two new BinaryVectors that are the children of the parents.
